abstract: General Electric announced that it would reduce its divisions to four from six, reflecting the company’s efforts to shed slow-growing businesses as its stock trades near a five-year low.
snippet: General Electric announced that it would reduce its divisions to four from six, reflecting the company’s efforts to shed slow-growing businesses as its stock trades near a five-year low.
lead_paragraph: General Electric announced on Friday that it would reduce its divisions to four from six, reflecting efforts by its chief executive, Jeffrey R. Immelt, to shed slow-growing businesses as its stock trades near a five-year low.

headline.main: G.E. Overhauls Divisions to Focus on Heavy Industry
headline.print_headline: G.E. Overhauls Divisions to Focus on Heavy Industry
